author: Tom Hennigan
title: Plan to bring home Irish people stranded in Peru awaiting green light from Lima
description: Flight ‘will depend on how soon aircraft can be accommodated by Peruvian authorities’
content:
The Governments plan to bring home 135 Irish people stranded in Peru by the countrys coronavirus lockdown is awaiting the green light from the government in Lima.
An email to those stranded sent on Monday morning by the Irish embassy in Chile said the timing… [+2065 chars]
